recipe.title: Sliced Tomatoes and Mozzarella with Three-Herb Pesto
ingredients: 3/4 pound mozzarella cheese (preferably fresh), sliced 1/4 inch thick
freshly ground black pepper to taste
basil, mint, and/or parsley sprigs for garnish if desired
instructions: On a large round platter alternate tomato and mozzarella slices, overlapping slightly, and spoon pesto in a ring around center of slices. Sprinkle tomatoes and mozzarella with pepper and garnish with herbs.
